snippet.title: Card Coder Announcement and Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3355940/Card_Coder/
Card Coder is a novel card-building roguelike: Create your own custom cards as you play by combining modular ability components. Fight challenging enemies in gridless card battles. Loot, shop & collect many different ability components to make truly unique cards out of 10 billion possibilities.
Wishlist now on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/3355940/Card_Coder/
